title: Greta: Late, Late Late Announcement
body:
hey yall! i hope you enjoy this, i’ve had it drafted as just a miscellanious piece for months and i’ve finally found a use for it! xx

~

It was never Greta and Harry’s intention to keep their relationship hidden for so long, they just happened never got around to telling the public. First, it would be management setting one of them up for a PR stunt, then it was rumours fueling sales, or sometimes the pair just decided they didn’t want the world to know their business. Not even when they got engaged did the public get a clue. Even as Greta wore her engagement ring to every event she attended and show she performed, nobody even knew she was dating someone so any engagement rumours were quickly brushed off.

But now, there’s an issue, a baby. When the couple first saw those 2 pink lines, they were ecstatic about being parents and it wasn’t until they had to tell the PR teams that shit hit the fan. But Harry and Greta were mature about it, and quickly came to the conclusion that they’d have to tell the world about their relationship, and the baby.

“But how? Neither of us can just drop a tweet saying ‘SURPRISE! WE’VE BEEN DATING FOR 3 YEARS AND NOW WE’RE HAVING A KID TOGETHER!’. The fans and the press’ll go absolutely mad,” Greta argued.

“We’ll sort it out,” Harry reassured Greta. “Whatever happens, we’re going to be okay”

A month or so later Harry was set to be a guest of the Late Late Show with James Corden to promote his sophomore album. James and Harry were quite close friends, and now Greta was in her second trimester, so the pair sat down and told him the news, and their plan on how to announce it to the public. Needless to say, James was ecstatic and completely on board to help them.

Their plan was set into motion the day before Harry was due to appear on James’ show. It started with Greta posting a photo on her instagram and twitter, tagging Harry.

The press and the fans went absolutely mad within the first 20 minutes of Greta posting, and even crazier when Harry liked the post on both twitter and instagram. The general consensus between the fans and media was that there was going to be some type of collaboration, and they were technically correct, but they meant a song, not a person.

Over their relationship, Greta had captured different moments during their 3 years. Cozy days, secret dinners, reactions to new, heartfelt songs, and everything in between; it was something they’d both grown accustomed to, though they both always thought it would just be something for the memory bank and not how they would tell the world their biggest secret.

The day that Harry was due to appear on the Late Late Show was wild on social media, even somebody who wasn’t involved or took notice to Greta or Harry could tell you something big was happening. The pair knew it may be a bit cruel to tease something with no speculation beforehand and then be inactive on social media, but the fans would find out in due time and they saw it as an opportunity for the calm before the storm.

Eventually, after enduring at least 40 minutes in LA traffic, they arrived at the studio and were both done up by a hair and makeup team, because Greta would be a ‘surprise guest’ during part of the show.

The shooting of the episode started and ran as usual, James did his monologue and introduced the guests backstage, went through the interviews and a game of ‘taller or shorter’ without a hitch, and then James was just about to announce Harry as the musical guest before he was interrupted.

“Uh, actually James, before he goes on,” the crowd erupted into cheers after Greta began speaking. “I have something I’d like to say.”

“Greta Hamburg, everybody!” James announced as Harry giddily smiled on the small stage where musical guests performed. “Now, what did you need to get off of your chest?”
“Right, yesterday I teased something on instagram and twitter yesterday and I-uh tagged a certain someone..”
“Mr Styles over there..” James pointed to Harry on the other side of the room.

“Yeah, that’s the one. We think we should actually tell everyone what that was about.”
“So Harry, do you want to come over here and spill the beans?” James gestured for Harry to join him and Greta. The air in the room was tense as everyone wanted to know what was going on. Harry walked from the performance stage to stand next to Greta, his arm around her shoulders.

“Now Harry’s not mic’d so you all at home won’t be able to hear him-” James started.

“Uh, unless I get uncomfortably close to Greta,” Harry interrupted while leaning into Greta. The audience laughed, as did Greta, Harry and James.

“Right so, are you two going to clue everyone here in?” James asked, bursting with anticipation.

“Do you want to say it or should I?” Greta whispered.

“You can,” Harry replied.

“Okay. Me and Harry met about 3 and a half years ago and since then we’ve been making something very special to both of us. And around 4 months ago we created something even more special. Just watch…” She smiled towards the camera as the video started playing to the audience.

It opened on a shot of a park in Holmes Chapel, Harry was holding the camera in one hand while the other clasped Greta’s as she was smiling at Harry behind the camera.

Greta’s voice was overlayed, “I remember once I got the flu and it was only a few months after we started dating and you came over and took care of me.”

“That’s when you knew you loved me?” Harry asked as more shots of them in Holmes Chapel were shown.

“Well I didn’t exactly know then but later on I realised that was when I first fell in love with you,” Greta said, to which Harry just ‘awwed’. “What about you?”

New shots flashed of Harry and Greta in different locations, Italy, New York, Sydney Harbour.

“When I went to Jamaica and I noticed how much I missed you and how much I just wanted you to be there with me.”
“That’s really sweet, darling…”

More shots flashed, sweet kisses, nights by the fireplace, a diamond ring being slipped on to Greta’s ring finger. And finally, the sound of a heartbeat, followed by a clip on an ultrasound scan, a clear outline of a baby. Then Harry and Greta’s voices chimed in.

“On the 14th of November, you proposed to me in Japan-” Greta said.

“Yes and I was a model boyfriend and it was super romantic and you had no idea and you wept for about an hour afterwards..” Harry joked.

“Sh, its my turn to speak!” There was an even louder laugh from Harry. “And we found out we were going to have a baby in April, actually it was Easter and we were in LA at the time.”
“And that’s when I wept for hours-happy tears.”

Soon enough the clips stopped and the screen faded to black, and back to James, and Greta and Harry, who were now holding hands.

“Well, there you have it, folks!” James announced as the audience’s cheers had finally died down. “Now do you two lovebirds want to perform?”

“Yes, we’re going to perform a song that means a lot to both of us, and we’ve reworked it into a duet..” Harry answered.

“We’re going to sing Your Song by Elton John.” Greta finished.

“Well get over there you two!” James jokingly, and lightly, shoved them out of the shot for them both to go to the performance area. “Once again, ladies and gentlemen, for the first time as a couple, Greta Hamburg and Harry Styles!”

“When I went to Jamaica and I noticed how much I missed you and how much I just wanted you to be there with me.”
“That’s really sweet, darling…”

More shots flashed, sweet kisses, nights by the fireplace, a diamond ring being slipped on to Greta’s ring finger. And finally, the sound of a heartbeat, followed by a clip on an ultrasound scan, a clear outline of a baby. Then Harry and Greta’s voices chimed in.

“On the 14th of November, you proposed to me in Japan-” Greta said.

“Yes and I was a model boyfriend and it was super romantic and you had no idea and you wept for about an hour afterwards..” Harry joked.

“Sh, its my turn to speak!” There was an even louder laugh from Harry. “And we found out we were going to have a baby in April, actually it was Easter and we were in LA at the time.”
“And that’s when I wept for hours-happy tears.”

Soon enough the clips stopped and the screen faded to black, and back to James, and Greta and Harry, who were now holding hands.

“Well, there you have it, folks!” James announced as the audience’s cheers had finally died down. “Now do you two lovebirds want to perform?”

“Yes, we’re going to perform a song that means a lot to both of us, and we’ve reworked it into a duet..” Harry answered.

“We’re going to sing Your Song by Elton John.” Greta finished.

“Well get over there you two!” James jokingly, and lightly, shoved them out of the shot for them both to go to the performance area. “Once again, ladies and gentlemen, for the first time as a couple, Greta Hamburg and Harry Styles!”
trail.content:
hey yall! i hope you enjoy this, i’ve had it drafted as just a miscellanious piece for months and i’ve finally found a use for it! xx

~

It was never Greta and Harry’s intention to keep their relationship hidden for so long, they just happened never got around to telling the public. First, it would be management setting one of them up for a PR stunt, then it was rumours fueling sales, or sometimes the pair just decided they didn’t want the world to know their business. Not even when they got engaged did the public get a clue. Even as Greta wore her engagement ring to every event she attended and show she performed, nobody even knew she was dating someone so any engagement rumours were quickly brushed off.

But now, there’s an issue, a baby. When the couple first saw those 2 pink lines, they were ecstatic about being parents and it wasn’t until they had to tell the PR teams that shit hit the fan. But Harry and Greta were mature about it, and quickly came to the conclusion that they’d have to tell the world about their relationship, and the baby.

“But how? Neither of us can just drop a tweet saying ‘SURPRISE! WE’VE BEEN DATING FOR 3 YEARS AND NOW WE’RE HAVING A KID TOGETHER!’. The fans and the press’ll go absolutely mad,” Greta argued.

“We’ll sort it out,” Harry reassured Greta. “Whatever happens, we’re going to be okay”

A month or so later Harry was set to be a guest of the Late Late Show with James Corden to promote his sophomore album. James and Harry were quite close friends, and now Greta was in her second trimester, so the pair sat down and told him the news, and their plan on how to announce it to the public. Needless to say, James was ecstatic and completely on board to help them.

Their plan was set into motion the day before Harry was due to appear on James’ show. It started with Greta posting a photo on her instagram and twitter, tagging Harry.

The press and the fans went absolutely mad within the first 20 minutes of Greta posting, and even crazier when Harry liked the post on both twitter and instagram. The general consensus between the fans and media was that there was going to be some type of collaboration, and they were technically correct, but they meant a song, not a person.

Over their relationship, Greta had captured different moments during their 3 years. Cozy days, secret dinners, reactions to new, heartfelt songs, and everything in between; it was something they’d both grown accustomed to, though they both always thought it would just be something for the memory bank and not how they would tell the world their biggest secret.

The day that Harry was due to appear on the Late Late Show was wild on social media, even somebody who wasn’t involved or took notice to Greta or Harry could tell you something big was happening. The pair knew it may be a bit cruel to tease something with no speculation beforehand and then be inactive on social media, but the fans would find out in due time and they saw it as an opportunity for the calm before the storm.

Eventually, after enduring at least 40 minutes in LA traffic, they arrived at the studio and were both done up by a hair and makeup team, because Greta would be a ‘surprise guest’ during part of the show.

The shooting of the episode started and ran as usual, James did his monologue and introduced the guests backstage, went through the interviews and a game of ‘taller or shorter’ without a hitch, and then James was just about to announce Harry as the musical guest before he was interrupted.

“Uh, actually James, before he goes on,” the crowd erupted into cheers after Greta began speaking. “I have something I’d like to say.”

“Greta Hamburg, everybody!” James announced as Harry giddily smiled on the small stage where musical guests performed. “Now, what did you need to get off of your chest?”
“Right, yesterday I teased something on instagram and twitter yesterday and I-uh tagged a certain someone..”
“Mr Styles over there..” James pointed to Harry on the other side of the room.

“Yeah, that’s the one. We think we should actually tell everyone what that was about.”
“So Harry, do you want to come over here and spill the beans?” James gestured for Harry to join him and Greta. The air in the room was tense as everyone wanted to know what was going on. Harry walked from the performance stage to stand next to Greta, his arm around her shoulders.

“Now Harry’s not mic’d so you all at home won’t be able to hear him-” James started.

“Uh, unless I get uncomfortably close to Greta,” Harry interrupted while leaning into Greta. The audience laughed, as did Greta, Harry and James.

“Right so, are you two going to clue everyone here in?” James asked, bursting with anticipation.

“Do you want to say it or should I?” Greta whispered.

“You can,” Harry replied.

“Okay. Me and Harry met about 3 and a half years ago and since then we’ve been making something very special to both of us. And around 4 months ago we created something even more special. Just watch…” She smiled towards the camera as the video started playing to the audience.

It opened on a shot of a park in Holmes Chapel, Harry was holding the camera in one hand while the other clasped Greta’s as she was smiling at Harry behind the camera.

Greta’s voice was overlayed, “I remember once I got the flu and it was only a few months after we started dating and you came over and took care of me.”

“That’s when you knew you loved me?” Harry asked as more shots of them in Holmes Chapel were shown.

“Well I didn’t exactly know then but later on I realised that was when I first fell in love with you,” Greta said, to which Harry just ‘awwed’. “What about you?”

New shots flashed of Harry and Greta in different locations, Italy, New York, Sydney Harbour.

“When I went to Jamaica and I noticed how much I missed you and how much I just wanted you to be there with me.”
“That’s really sweet, darling…”

More shots flashed, sweet kisses, nights by the fireplace, a diamond ring being slipped on to Greta’s ring finger. And finally, the sound of a heartbeat, followed by a clip on an ultrasound scan, a clear outline of a baby. Then Harry and Greta’s voices chimed in.

“On the 14th of November, you proposed to me in Japan-” Greta said.

“Yes and I was a model boyfriend and it was super romantic and you had no idea and you wept for about an hour afterwards..” Harry joked.

“Sh, its my turn to speak!” There was an even louder laugh from Harry. “And we found out we were going to have a baby in April, actually it was Easter and we were in LA at the time.”
“And that’s when I wept for hours-happy tears.”

Soon enough the clips stopped and the screen faded to black, and back to James, and Greta and Harry, who were now holding hands.

“Well, there you have it, folks!” James announced as the audience’s cheers had finally died down. “Now do you two lovebirds want to perform?”

“Yes, we’re going to perform a song that means a lot to both of us, and we’ve reworked it into a duet..” Harry answered.

“We’re going to sing Your Song by Elton John.” Greta finished.

“Well get over there you two!” James jokingly, and lightly, shoved them out of the shot for them both to go to the performance area. “Once again, ladies and gentlemen, for the first time as a couple, Greta Hamburg and Harry Styles!”

First, it would be management setting one of them up for a PR stunt, then it was rumours fueling sales, or sometimes the pair just decided they didn’t want the world to know their business. Not even when they got engaged did the public get a clue. Even as Greta wore her engagement ring to every event she attended and show she performed, nobody even knew she was dating someone so any engagement rumours were quickly brushed off.
